description: In order to supply the Black Tower with all of it's construction needs, Labrynna developed a quick process for utterly stripping all available resources from both above and under the earth in any given area.
tooltip: In order to supply the Black Tower with all of it's construction needs, Labrynna developed a quick process for utterly stripping all available resources from both above and under the earth in any given area. (Stone and Ore gather rate increased by 100%)
